summary: The module implements utilities for invoking Azure CLI commands and orchestrates the full lifecycle of Azure resources required to run Prefect push work pools on Azure Container Instances, including subscription selection, resource group creation, Azure AD app registration, service principal management, role assignments, and credential generation.
business_intent: Automate the provisioning of Azure infrastructure so that Prefect users can quickly set up and run containerâ€‘based work pools on Azure without manual Azure configuration.
